column6: THE ONCE AND FUTURE JUGGERNAUT 1 of 4 - We've all heard the phrase "those are big shoes to fill." - That's especially true when those are the massive boots of the unstoppable Juggernaut. - So when the Gem of Cyttorak reappears, the X-Men must ask themselves: Who's going to wear those boots?
column8: | penciller (cover):Kris Anka | artist:Jorge Fornes | writer:Chris Yost
